item.title: Sam Altman on Machine Intelligence
item.description: Sam Altman has a great short series on the development of superhuman machine intelligence (SMI). Machine intelligence, Part 1 is on why machine intelligence is something that we should be afraid of while Part 2 is on what we should do about it. And then thereâ€™s Technology predictions, the perfect closer.
